passage: Learner's definition of EXTREME. 1. : very great in degree. The plant is sensitive to extreme heat and cold. They are living in extreme poverty. If you have to go out in the storm, use extreme caution. [=be very careful] Extreme accuracy is required.

• CHATTEL (noun) The noun CHATTEL has 1 sense: 1. personal as opposed to real property; any tangible movable property (furniture or domestic animals or a car etc) Familiarity information: CHATTEL used as a noun is very rare.
The Great Leap Forward (Chinese: 大跃进; pinyin: Dà yuè jìn) of the People's Republic of China (PRC) was an economic and social campaign by the Communist Party of China (CPC) from 1958 to 1961.
